name: 劉宛淯
objective:
本課程運用哈佛個案和加拿大 Ivey 個案來說明企業管理的理論觀念以及分析方法，讓學生對企業管理有一定程度的了解，課程內容將以國外著名案例為基礎，主題包括 (但不局限於): 財務管理、策略管理、創新管理、組織領導、行銷管理等。課程採用個案教學方法。
This course uses Ivey/Harvard case studies to enhance IMBA students' business concepts and theories. In addition, this course is also to teach the case writing skills. The case topics are: financial management, strategic management, marketing management, innovations…other topics of students interests will also be added. 

This course uses Ivey/Harvard case studies to enhance IMBA and international students' understanding of business concepts and theories, and learn how to write papers, thesis, and career application.  All students will benefit in learning all the following skills and abilities, including: 

1: How to read academic papers
2: How to write [papers and cases ...] for publication
3: How to develop ideas and framework to write your thesis
4: How to build case writing skills and academic paper writing skills
5: How to apply theories to real business world (for your future career...)
6: How to integrate science fields and business fields...
7: Cross-cultural interaction and communication learning
8: Creative Application of theories to real business fields
schedule:
Week 1-2 : Introduction of Case Study, Managerial Analysis, and Professional writing & more...
Week 3 - 4: Harvard Business Case study & analysis - M1
Week 4 - 5: Simulations & Practice A: thinking, writing, modifying, & presenting in professional English
Week 6 - 7: Harvard Business Case study & analysis - M2
Week 7 - 8:Simulations & Practice B: thinking, writing, modifying, & presenting in professional English
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10 - 11: Harvard Business Case study & analysis - M3
Week 11 - 12: Simulations & Practice C: thinking, writing, modifying, & presenting in professional English
Week 13 - 14: Harvard Business Case study & analysis - M4
Week 14 - 15: Simulations & Practice D: thinking, writing, modifying, & presenting in professional English
Week 16 - 17: Management Case Proposals: ABCD + E+ 
Week 17 - 18: Final presentations
scorePolicy:
Class discussions and assignments 50% 
Presentations 30% 
Final Project  20%
materials:
Harvard and/or Ivey business cases
International Management Materials
Films and videos
